name: SalamiChild's JamPack
description:
A bundle of games jams entries from 2012 up until early 2015. While they probably don't warrant their own page, they do fit neatly into here~

Including:

Nyctophobia - One of my very first games jam entries!

Wrath of the Water Wizard - A team effort which won "Best Innovation"!

Unnamed Pong game - One of the myriad of games I've started by never finished (This one plays just fine though)!

...And more~
